name: HemoglobinA1CInDiabetesMellitusPoorlyControlled
title: Hemoglobin A1C in diabetes mellitus poorly controlled
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The set of values focuses on type 1 or type 2 (insulin dependent or non insulin dependent) diabetes mellitus out of control.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify type 1 or type 2 (insulin dependent or non insulin dependent) diabetes mellitus with a HbA1C value reflecting poor control.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hemoglobin A1C reflecting poor control),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Hemoglobin A1c greater than 9% indicating poor diabetic control (finding)

contains.display: Hemoglobin A1c greater than nine percent indicating poor diabetic control (finding)
